payana_profile_table.description: This table will hold all the profile details of the user
payana_profile_table.purpose: To fetch the details of a profile

payana_profile_auth_table.description: This table will hold the authentication details of the user
payana_profile_auth_table.purpose: To fetch the authentication details of a profile

payana_activity_guide_thumbnail_table.description: This table will hold the thumbnail images for the activity guides
payana_activity_guide_thumbnail_table.purpose: To fetch the thumbnail images details for activity guides

payana_travel_footprint_table.description: This table will hold all the travel footprint details of the user
payana_travel_footprint_table.purpose: To fetch the travel footprint details of a profile

payana_excursion_checkin_permission_tabl.description: This table will hold permissions for the excursion/check in objects
payana_excursion_checkin_permission_tabl.purpose: To fetch the travel footprint details of a profile

payana_city_to_influencers_table.description: This table will hold the city to influencers mapping
payana_city_to_influencers_table.purpose: To fetch the travel footprint details of a profile

payana_state_to_influencers_table.description: This table will hold the state to influencers mapping
payana_state_to_influencers_table.purpose: To fetch the travel footprint details of a profile

payana_country_to_influencers_table.description: This table will hold the country to influencers mapping
payana_country_to_influencers_table.purpose: To fetch the travel footprint details of a profile

payana_itinerary_table.description: This table will hold all the details of an itinerary
payana_itinerary_table.purpose: To fetch the details of an itinerary

payana_excursion_table.description: This table will hold all the details of an excursion
payana_excursion_table.purpose: To fetch the details of an excursion

payana_checkin_table.description: This table will hold all the details of a checkin
payana_checkin_table.purpose: To fetch the details of a checkin

payana_travel_buddy_list_table.description: This table will hold all the list of friends of an user
payana_travel_buddy_list_table.purpose: To fetch the list of all friends. Search friend itineraries from place A to place B or at a place -- stage 1

payana_comments_table.description: This table will hold the list of all the comments on a picture/excursion/itinerary saved in GCS
payana_comments_table.purpose: This table will hold the list of all the comments on a picture/excursion/itinerary saved in GCS

payana_entity_to_comments_table.description: This table will hold the mapping from entity (picture/excursion/itinerary) ID to the list of all the comments on a picture/excursion/itinerary saved in GCS
payana_entity_to_comments_table.purpose: This table will hold the list of all the comments on a picture/excursion/itinerary saved in GCS

payana_likes_table.description: This table will hold the list of all the likes on a picture/excursion/itinerary saved in GCS
payana_likes_table.purpose: To fetch the likes of picture/excursion/itinerary saved in GCS

payana_place_metadata_table.description: This table will hold the city, state, country details of a place ID
payana_place_metadata_table.purpose: To fetch the the city, state, country details of a place ID

payana_place_state_table.description: This table will hold all the cities in the state
payana_place_state_table.purpose: To fetch all the cities in the state

payana_place_country_table.description: This table will hold all the cities in the country
payana_place_country_table.purpose: To fetch all the cities in the country

payana_neighboring_cities_table.description: This table will hold all the neighboring city list for a given city
payana_neighboring_cities_table.purpose: This table will hold all the neighboring city list for a given city

payana_personal_place_id_itinerary_table.description: This table will hold all the itineraries for a given profile and place ID
payana_personal_place_id_itinerary_table.purpose: This table will hold all the itineraries for a given profile and place ID

payana_personal_city_itinerary_table.description: This table will hold all the itineraries for a given profile and city
payana_personal_city_itinerary_table.purpose: This table will hold all the itineraries for a given profile and city

payana_personal_state_itinerary_table.description: This table will hold all the itineraries for a given profile and state
payana_personal_state_itinerary_table.purpose: This table will hold all the itineraries for a given profile and state

payana_personal_country_itinerary_table.description: This table will hold all the itineraries for a given profile and country
payana_personal_country_itinerary_table.purpose: This table will hold all the itineraries for a given profile and country

payana_profile_page_itinerary_table.description: This table will hold all the itinerary list for a given profile
payana_profile_page_itinerary_table.purpose: This table will hold all the itinerary list for a given profile

payana_global_place_id_itinerary_table.description: This table will hold all the global itineraries for a given place ID
payana_global_place_id_itinerary_table.purpose: This table will hold all the global itineraries for a given place ID

payana_global_city_itinerary_table.description: This table will hold all the global itineraries for a given city
payana_global_city_itinerary_table.purpose: This table will hold all the global itineraries for a given city

payana_global_state_itinerary_table.description: This table will hold all the global itineraries for a given state
payana_global_state_itinerary_table.purpose: This table will hold all the global itineraries for a given state

payana_global_country_itinerary_table.description: This table will hold all the global itineraries for a given country
payana_global_country_itinerary_table.purpose: This table will hold all the global itineraries for a given country

payana_global_influencer_feed_search_cac.description: This table will hold all the global itineraries feed/searched results for a given user
payana_global_influencer_feed_search_cac.purpose: This table will hold all the global itineraries feed/searched results for a given user

payana_personal_influencer_feed_search_c.description: This table will hold all the personal influencer itineraries feed/searched results for a given user
payana_personal_influencer_feed_search_c.purpose: This table will hold all the personal influencer itineraries feed/searched results for a given user

payana_travel_buddy_feed_search_cache_ta.description: This table will hold all the personal travel buddy itineraries feed/searched results for a given user
payana_travel_buddy_feed_search_cache_ta.purpose: This table will hold all the personal travel buddy itineraries feed/searched results for a given user

payana_profile_to_search_places_activiti.description: This table will hold all the cities and activities searched by a given user
payana_profile_to_search_places_activiti.purpose: This table will hold all the cities and activities searched by a given user

payana_city_autocomplete_table.description: This table will hold all the cities for autocomplete indexing
payana_city_autocomplete_table.purpose: This table will hold all the cities for autocomplete indexing

payana_users_autocomplete_table.description: This table will hold all the users indexed by cities for autocomplete indexing
payana_users_autocomplete_table.purpose: This table will hold all the users indexed by cities for autocomplete indexing
